data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Mahbubnagar, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahbubnagar, Telangana, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, guide the 1,736 believers in Mahbubnagar to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Mahbubnagar, Telangana, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 156,065 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Mahbubnagar. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Madiga Penda people. Make the Madiga Penda people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please raise up prophets in Mahbubnagar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Mahbubnagar.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mahbubnagar, Telangana, India has a population of 157,800.

We estimate Mahbubnagar has 1,736 people who might know Jesus, 1,915 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 154,150 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Mahbubnagar who will make disciples who make disciples.
